setMenu(INITIAL_MENU);INITIAL_MENU.forEach(item=>{addDoc(menuRef,item);});}});if(!user)return unsubscribeMenu;// 2. Orders Listener (Only when logged in)
const ordersRef=collection(db,"artifacts",APP_ID,"public","data","orders");const unsubscribeOrders=onSnapshot(ordersRef,snapshot=>{const loadedOrders=snapshot.docs.map(doc=>_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},doc.data()),{},{docId:doc.id// Important for updates
}));setOrders(loadedOrders);});return()=>{unsubscribeMenu();unsubscribeOrders();};},[user]);/* --- ACTIONS --- */const handleRoleSelect=selectedRole=>{setRole(selectedRole);setStep("auth");};const handleLogin=async function(email,password){let method=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:"email";if(method==="google"){await signInWithPopup(auth,googleProvider);}else{await signInWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password);}};const handleSignup=async function(email,password,masterKey){let method=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:"email";if(masterKey!==MASTER_KEY)throw new Error("Invalid Master Key");let userCredential;if(method==="google"){userCredential=await signInWithPopup(auth,googleProvider);}else{userCredential=await createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password);}const profileData={uid:userCredential.user.uid,role:role,email:userCredential.user.email,name:userCredential.user.displayName||"",provider:method,createdAt:new Date().toISOString()};await setDoc(doc(db,"artifacts",APP_ID,"users",userCredential.user.uid),profileData);};const handleLogout=async()=>{await signOut(auth);setStep("role");setRole(null);};const addToOrder=async orderData=>{await addDoc(collection(db,"artifacts",APP_ID,"public","data","orders"),orderData);};const updateOrder=async(orderId,updates)=>{const order=orders.find(o=>o.orderId===orderId);if(!order||!order.docId)return;await updateDoc(doc(db,"artifacts",APP_ID,"public","data","orders",order.docId),updates);};// Menu Management Actions
const handleAddMenuItem=async item=>{await addDoc(collection(db,"artifacts",APP_ID,"public","data","menu"),item);};const handleUpdateMenuItem=async(docId,updates)=>{await updateDoc(doc(db,"artifacts",APP_ID,"public","data","menu",docId),updates);};const handleDeleteMenuItem=async docId=>{await deleteDoc(doc(db,"artifacts",APP_ID,"public","data","menu",docId));};const updateUserProfile=async data=>{if(!user)return;await setDoc(doc(db,"artifacts",APP_ID,"users",user.uid),data,{merge:true});setUserProfile(prev=>_objectSpread(_objectSpread({},prev),data));};/* --- RENDER --- */if(step==="role"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RoleSelector,{onSelect:handleRoleSelect,currentTheme:currentTheme,onThemeChange:handleThemeChange});}if(step==="auth"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthScreen,{role:role,onLogin:handleLogin,onSignup:handleSignup,setStep:setStep,setRole:setRole,currentTheme:currentTheme});}if(step==="app"&&user&&userProfile){if(userProfile.role==="student"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StudentApp,{menu:menu,orders:orders,addToOrder:addToOrder,user:user,userProfile:userProfile,updateUserProfile:updateUserProfile,logout:handleLogout,currentTheme:currentTheme,onThemeChange:handleThemeChange});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StaffApp,{orders:orders,menu:menu,updateOrder:updateOrder,onAddMenu:handleAddMenuItem,onUpdateMenu:handleUpdateMenuItem,onDeleteMenu:handleDeleteMenuItem,logout:handleLogout,currentTheme:currentTheme,onThemeChange:handleThemeChange});}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"h-screen w-full flex items-center justify-center bg-slate-50 text-indigo-600",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"animate-spin rounded-full h-12 w-12 border-t-2 border-b-2 border-current"})});}
